item.title: GOTOTWIN: Advancing Renewable Energy in the Adriatic Ionian Region through the Use of Digital Twins
item.description: The GoToTwin project addresses the common challenge of accelerating the adoption and integration of renewable energy sources in the Adriatic Ionian region. The project leverages digital twin technology to tackle pressing energy and sustainability issues in the region.
